title: A man sold 10 eggs for Rs. 36 and thus gained 20% profit. At what price did he buy an egg? - Quora

response.answer_text: let man bought eggs for ₹x Profit = 20x/100 = x/5 36 = x+x/5=6x/5 x = 30 = price of 10 eggs Price of 1 egg = ₹30/10 = ₹3 Thanks :)
SP of 1 egg = 36/10 = 3.6 CP of 1 egg = 3.6 * (100/120) = 3 Therefore, Cost price of an is Rs 3
